title: SPOILER TALK! Star Wars Andor Episode 4 - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Learn more about the NZXT Canvas Gaming Monitors at http://nzxt.co/KINDAFUNNY

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Tim, Barrett, Saige, and Carboni give their reaction and review of Star Wars Andor on Disney Plus starring Diego Luna.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Impressions
00:14:00 - Spoiler Talk!

Follow Saige: https://twitter.com/NotSaige

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
